channel.title: OnOptions
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from OnOptions, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: This Norwegian skier is petitioning the IOC for change with a ‘Ski Fossil Free’ initiative ahead of the 2026 Olympics
item.description: Norwegian skier Nikolai Schirmer on Wednesday handed the International Olympic Committee a petition signed by more than 21,000 people and professional...

item.title: Bitcoin is having a bad year as price tumbles to fresh lows today: Why does crypto keep falling in 2026?
item.description: Much to the chagrin of investors, the value of Bitcoin continues to slide. As of Wednesday morning, the world’s most popular cryptocurrency was tradin...

item.title: JD Vance appeals to allies for new ‘trading bloc’ that keeps Trump’s tariffs in place, secures access to rare earths
item.description: “We don’t want to ever go through what we went through a year ago,” Trump said on Monday when announcing Project Vault.

item.title: Bill Gates Responds to New Jeffrey Epstein Email Controversy
item.description: He claims the information in the messages is ‘false.’

item.title: Something broke in the economy in 2023 that explains why so many people are miserable about it, New York Fed says
item.description: Higher-income Americans and those with college degrees have ramped up their spending more quickly in the past three years than other consumers.

item.title: Chipotle has a 4-part plan to boost flat sales. Part 1 is ‘the most celebrated limited-time offer in history’
item.description: Shares of Chipotle Mexican Grill are down over 6% in premarket trading following a relatively humdrum fourth-quarter earnings report. The report, rele...

item.title: How to beat change fatigue
item.description: We live in a world of increasing change . The international order is shifting and political certainties are evaporating day by day. Technological shif...

item.title: Wall Street’s Sell-Off Signals Trouble Ahead, but Not Because of an AI Bubble
item.description: This week’s market decline has tech investors heading for the doors.

item.title: Trump hit with $16 billion lawsuit for move to cripple New York metro area rail tunnel
item.description: “Allowing this project to stop would put one of the country’s most heavily used transit corridors at risk,” New York AG Letitia James said.

item.title: Republican Donor Ken Griffin Criticizes Trump Over Fellow CEOs Having to ‘Suck Up’ to the White House
item.description: The Citadel CEO warned that corporate success is starting to hinge on political allegiance instead of performance.

item.title: Americans are so broke and housing is so expensive that ‘rent now, pay later’ is on the rise
item.description: Companies such as Flex, Livble and, more recently, Affirm, say breaking rent into multiple payments can help renters manage cash flow. Beware, experts...

item.title: Why Leaders Need to Listen More
item.description: When leadership breaks down, it is rarely because the strategy was wrong. More often, it is because something important was missed.

item.title: Masha Bucher Appears in Epstein Files as a Founder Fixer
item.description: The Day One Ventures founder continues to invest in hard tech companies, like brain tech startup Merge Labs, founded by Sam Altman.

item.title: Trump’s D.C. building boom includes a proposed arch, the ‘biggest one of all’
item.description: President Donald Trump says history is on his side. He wants to build a towering arch near the Lincoln Memorial and argues that the nation’s capital f...

item.title: The ‘Kardashian Kurse’ and a Jurassic Park reunion are among the Super Bowl commercials planned for this year
item.description: Space sold for an average of $8 million per 30-second unit, but a handful of spots sold for $10 million-plus, a record, said NBC VP Peter Lazarus.
